summary: This is a brief email from August 30, 2019, inquiring about ordering a transcript of a hearing in the case United States v. Epstein. It appears to be internal communication between legal or administrative staff regarding case documentation.

events.title: Hearing in United States v. Epstein
events.description: A hearing was held in the case United States v. Epstein, the transcript of which is the subject of the email inquiry.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 30, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody.
The subject is the case 'United States v. Epstein', indicating ongoing legal proceedings.
The email is a request to order a transcript from a hearing held that week, showing active case management.
